casebody.data:
Foremost Insurance Company of Grand Rapids Michigan
v.
Charles Raines, Martha Raines, and Sherri Griggs No. 112P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016. Mr. Gene T. Leicht, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Raines, Charles, et al. Mr. Joseph L. Nelson, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Foremost Insurance Company Of Grand Rapids Michigan.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 29th of March 2016 by Defendants (Charles Raines and Martha Raines) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
